plot: Live-action and animation blend together in this educational fantasy about a family of lions running a library filled with adventurous and musical books.
plot_en: Live-action and animation blend together in this educational fantasy about a family of lions running a library filled with adventurous and musical books.
plot_es: Live-action and animation blend together in this educational fantasy about a family of lions running a library filled with adventurous and musical books.
title: Between the Lions
